reviews.review: Great game. Need to use a walkthough to get by though.

Quite honestly, I could play an entire game with Alyx as a companion.

As short as Episode 1 is it does a really good job at making her an actual character instead of a forgettable background NPC who just gives you the Gravity Gun.

Пожалуй, одна из самых слабых игр в серии, в виду своей продолжительности. Зная наизусть все локации, игру спокойно можно пробежать за полтора часа, чего явно мало для глубокого погружения. Плюсы те же что у Half-Life 2: графика, физика, геймплей, и сюжет. Отдельного внимания заслуживает вторая глава, проходящая в ядре Цитадели. Один из самых запоминающихся моментов в серии
Half life 2.5 still holds up pretty well

Короткая игра на 6 часов порадовала достижение только с грави пушко
7/10

Una continuacion de historia, pero nada más.
La historia aqui es bastante simple, tanto que no tengo mucho que comentar de ella, esta bien y ya.
La jugabilidad es literalmente la misma que Half-Life 2, sin cambios, todo igual.

Como continuacion esta bien, no destaca mucho como juego independiente, pero teniendo en cuenta que el objetivo era dar una continuacion a Half-Life 2, pues no tengo queja, lo recomiendo.
Если объединить 1 и 2 эпизод вместе то вполне могла появиться half-life 3
Yes I recommend this game to other players.

[h1] Excelente continuación [/h1] 
[b] Me encantó este episodio, algo corto, pero continuamos justo donde concluyó el Half Life 2 y se nota más la presencia de Alyx, excelente compañera en el juego. Recomendado. [/b]
GOOD GAME. BUY NOW BUT FIRST PLAY Hl2
Именно с этой игры я понял почему Half-Life легендарная игра

The first parts aren't fun in gameplay the other parts are fun but Alyx is with you always and she is pretty dam annoying. It is an ok game in general is it worth it? No not really just play Half Life 2 instead and don't bother with the Episodes. It is aright in conclusion. Just get rid of the first part and Alyx.

Слишком быстро Я это говно прошёл, ну хоть купил эту часть за 51 рубль, а так рекомендую

Propably the shortest and least interesting piece of Half life content, yet very essential to the story progression and lore. It still is very good, but there is not enough of Half life in there for my liking.

Worse than episode 2 and the base game but still pretty good. Missions just weren't as memorable as the other games but it was still a decent romp with the world building and gameplay you expect. The finale is a bit meh though.

Feels a bit unfinished and the atmosphere is not as polished as in the original Half-Life 2. The story isn't as intricate, Alyx is unbelievably obnoxious with her neverending flurry of fangirl remarks and the dialogue is trite at best. Still worth playing for the story and it gets quite a bit better with Episode Two, even though none of these continuations reach the level of the original.
[b]Якщо в Гордона Фрімена є якась мета, він усе зробить, щоб її досягти.[/b]

A Magnificent follow up to the main game. This Episode way more horror oriented with ingenious puzzles. A must have while playing through Half Life 2 as it expands on it. A Solid 10 out of 10 from me.

La continuación de una gran historia, escenarios con mas detalle y que llaman la atención. Ahora la luz de la linterna dura un poco más.

Following the long awaited HL2, this episode presented, for me at least, a different pace and look. Just like HL2, I could not recommend this game more!

Pros: HEV Mark 4 Protective System
Cons: Do you like playing in handcuffs and have your freedom limited? Well meet Alyx - the most annoying NPC that does not let you move forward until her dumb lines of dialog are spit out. Vaporizing her using the gravity ball bug is the real Half-Life 2 ending.

First person shooter.  Many twists and turns.  Important to save often.  Good enough to be replayed periodically.  Highly recommended and it is easy to get into and challenging enough to draw you back after you have played it front to back.  Definitely worth the investment as it his multiple hours of play so you get great bag for your buck and there is no free lunch while you play it.
Its genraly a fun game I finnaly have all the half life games.

Интереснейшее, хоть и короткое дополнение для хл2. Сюжет продолжает историю хл2. Однозначно рекомендую пройти это дополнение всем, кто прошёл хл2. Графика, физика, стрельба и разнообразие на уровне хл2.
its very cool swap type game
Uses just the gravity gun. But good story.

Когда вышел эпизод первый к ХЛ2, я просто дристал от счастья, ведь тогда верил  что халфа будет выходить чаще, пусть немного, но чаще и наконец-то история продолжится и тогда в те далёкие времена, халф лайф 3 был настолько реален, как  и реален эпизод 3. В наших сердцах конечно. 
Ну а в целом, это наверно первая игра нового поколения того времени, чисто ПК экзы вроде дум 3, фар край и оригинального ХЛ отгремели, теперь нужно было играм расти в сторону постановки и подачи сюжета. Именно первый эпизод сделал этот шаг.  Люблю халфу, как игру и как частичку того беззаботного времени где все друзья были рядом и живы и мы фантазировали и ждали эпизод 2.
Мне бы хотелось остаться в той вечности...

Episode 1 is the odd middle child of the Half Life 2 family. While not as flushed out as Episode 2, it is still an enjoyable and integral piece of the Half Life 2 puzzle. It is a more puzzle oriented game in the beginning, with you having to do a lot of dodging and ducking eventually opening up into something more relatable to what you experienced in Half Life 2. 

Episode 1 almost plays like an extended Ravenholm as the Grav Gun is the central focus of gameplay from the beginning of the game, and arguably throughout the remainder. That is not to say there isn’t room for some good gunplay, but it is to say that I beat the entire game firing only a single bullet and using the Grav Gun for the remainder.

The crumbling ruins of City 17 are an awesome site to behold. Dr. Kleiner's voice resonates messages of hope as well as warning throughout the city while rebels attempt to flee and the Combine infrastructure collapses. The ending arrives rather abruptly, and turns into a rather tedious and short escort mission. It is at this point where the game starts to feel a bit rushed to the conclusion. In the end Episode 1 is more reminiscent of an expansion pack than a stand alone game.

A must have for completionists, and to appreciate the wonderful story of Half Life 2, even if you only play through it once.
